metadata.description: Battle-tested agents, prompts, commands, and plugins built for enterprise teams who ship code daily. Production-grade components you can actually trust in the wild.

plugins.name: engineering-orchestrator
plugins.description: Orchestrate complex software engineering tasks by coordinating specialized agents through progressive disclosure, architectural planning, and deliberate agent selection.

agents.name: engineering-orchestrator
agents.description: Orchestrate complex software engineering tasks by coordinating specialized agents through progressive disclosure, architectural planning, and deliberate agent selection. Use when tasks span multiple domains (backend, frontend, database, DevOps) or require architectural decision-making.

plugins.name: database-architect
plugins.description: Design, optimize, and evolve database schemas for production systems. Handles schema modeling, migration strategies, indexing decisions, and query performance tuning.

agents.name: database-advisor
agents.description: Strategic database technology advisor for critical platform decisions, migration evaluations, and architectural trade-off analysis. Use when selecting database technologies, evaluating polyglot persistence, or assessing re-platforming decisions.

agents.name: sql-server-architect
agents.description: Design SQL Server schemas, optimize T-SQL queries, implement indexing strategies, and configure high availability solutions for enterprise databases.

agents.name: cosmosdb-architect
agents.description: Design Azure Cosmos DB schemas, select partition keys, optimize RU consumption, implement change feeds, and configure multi-region deployments. Use proactively during database design and performance optimization phases.
